text: Vicente Lucio Salazar (20 December 1832 - 14 February 1896) was President of Ecuador between 16 April 1895 and 1 September 1895. He became Vice President in 1894, and became President when Luis Cordero left office. ==Other websites== * Official Website of the Ecuadorian Government about the country President's History Category:1832 births Category:1896 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Presidents of Ecuador Category:Politicians from Quito
title: Vicente Lucio Salazar
